meaningMnemonic: You <kanji>consent</kanji> and <kanji>know</kanji> everything that's going on. You <vocabulary>consent</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>know</vocabulary> about all this. You're <vocabulary>aware</vocabulary> of it.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
